title: 1miau
author: 1miau
created_time: September 07, 2023, 01:29:16 AMLast edit: September 07, 2023, 02:20:48 AM by 1miau
content: 1miau special deal is currently a project under development. It's a special Bitcoin deal, where real Bitcoin is involved. People can only be invited by 1miau. Members currently eligible for 1miau special deal: - buwaytress- slaman29- 1miauRules: - buwaytress will hold all funds. - 1miau will cover any funds due to lost rounds by insurance. Funds will be covered in BTC. - eligible members have a financial agreement to co-bankroll crypto (Bitcoin). Profits- profits will be evenly distributed. Profits will be distributed in BTC. - share depends on number of participants for each FUND (2 participants 50/50, 3 participants 33/33/33, 4 participants 25/25/25/25). - buwaytress will distribute profitsI hereby confirm to agree to all rules from above.

comments.author: slaman29
comments.body: I also confirm to agree to all of the rules above. Details are maintained privately and I am in the process of sending the BTC funds to buwaytress as a cofunder to this special project.Maybe if all parties agree at the end of everything we can share some details, in terms of numbers  GL both!!

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Quote from: slaman29 on September 07, 2023, 09:14:48 AMI also confirm to agree to all of the rules above. Nice to have you in, I'm definitely looking forward how our project will proceed.  Kudos for giving it a try.  Quote from: slaman29 on September 07, 2023, 09:14:48 AMMaybe if all parties agree at the end of everything we can share some details, in terms of numbers  GL both!!Yes, maybe we can give a conclusion about our project later. We don't know yet, what will happen but hopefully, we will get a positive result. Just waiting for buwaytress to give a confirmation here and we are set for now.

comments.author: buwaytress
comments.body: I confirm agreement! I don't know how much details we can share, but I'll leave that to 1miau's wisdom. Personally, I think it's a really niche endeavour, but completely aligned with the type of risk I'm comfortable with.I've sent my details over, here's to our success!

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Quote from: buwaytress on September 08, 2023, 01:14:45 PMI confirm agreement! +1Nice to have your confirmation. Quote from: buwaytress on September 08, 2023, 01:14:45 PMI don't know how much details we can share, but I'll leave that to 1miau's wisdom. For sure.  We will evaluate it, discuss it after (hopefully successful) conclusion of our project deal and see which lessons we can draw from it. Quote from: buwaytress on September 08, 2023, 01:14:45 PMPersonally, I think it's a really niche endeavour, but completely aligned with the type of risk I'm comfortable with.Definitely, it's a great opportunity to explore and after all I'm hoping we can avoid any close call. Or if we will get a close call, that it turns out to be in our favor.  Well, even a close call should be pretty unlikely.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: I confirm I am very curious what this is all about  It's like a riddle, and I love riddles but hate not knowing the answer

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on September 11, 2023, 08:35:48 AMI confirm I am very curious what this is all about  It's like a riddle, and I love riddles but hate not knowing the answer Hello LoyceV  It's a really tough task to give a precise forecast of our 1miau special deal and probably you won't be much wiser after my post but I'll give it a try. As mentioned in our description it's about a special deal, where real Bitcoin is involved. Regarding the subject matter you probably know cryptofrka's and Trofo's famous ⭐⚽⭐ Sportsbet's Bitcointalk Sports Fanatics League (BSFL) – 7000+$ rewards ⭐⚽⭐. Trofo and cryptofrka really deserve some credit for their effort. And our deal is different but based on sports as well. That's why buwaytress and slaman29 are involved here. They are two sports specialists and know a lot about that issue.

comments.author: cryptofrka
comments.body: Hey fellas, love the mystery Thanks for the shoutout, we wish you good luck with whatever this is and are of course interested to hear more about it!

Quote from: cryptofrka on September 11, 2023, 09:29:08 PMHey fellas, love the mysteryThanks for the shoutout, we wish you good luck with whatever this is and are of course interested to hear more about it!Heyy  Yes, luck is necessary of course but from what we have agreed on, I believe we are safe. Unfortunately I don't have enough time for it.  But I really like your dedication for BSFL.  +1

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: I don't like the mystery, I feel left out   Got used to being part of everything that happens in gambling sections of the furum I guess.Excellent job on building suspense though. Looking forward to seeing what it is all about.

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Hello Trofo Quote from: Trofo on September 12, 2023, 05:31:04 AMI don't like the mystery, I feel left out   Got used to being part of everything that happens in gambling sections of the furum I guess.If something exciting will happen, be assured, you will get to know about it. Quote from: Trofo on September 12, 2023, 05:31:04 AMExcellent job on building suspense though. Looking forward to seeing what it is all about.From our discussion here, our topic seems to be quite exciting but I don’t want to raise too high expectations because it's really just a very trivial special deal, so having too high expectations might result in a disappointment because it's indeed very trivial.  Our topic is just a place to write down all important details to be set for starting.
